channel.title: üè¢ KAIST on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ KAIST on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Inference-Time Scaling for Flow Models via Stochastic Generation and Rollover Budget Forcing
item.description: Inference-time scaling for flow models enhances alignment with user preferences via stochastic generation and budget allocation.

item.title: Silent Branding Attack: Trigger-free Data Poisoning Attack on Text-to-Image Diffusion Models
item.description: New ‘Silent Branding Attack’ poisons text-to-image models, embedding brand logos without text prompts, raising ethical issues for image generation tools.

item.title: Tuning-Free Multi-Event Long Video Generation via Synchronized Coupled Sampling
item.description: SynCoS: Synchronized sampling generates high-quality & coherent long videos from text, without extra training!

item.title: Sketch-of-Thought: Efficient LLM Reasoning with Adaptive Cognitive-Inspired Sketching
item.description: Sketch-of-Thought(SoT) reduces LLM token usage by up to 76% while maintaining (or improving) accuracy via cognitive-inspired sketching.

item.title: Is Safety Standard Same for Everyone? User-Specific Safety Evaluation of Large Language Models
item.description: LLMs fail to act safely when considering user-specific safety standards, which were made to be solved via new benchmark.

item.title: SafeRoute: Adaptive Model Selection for Efficient and Accurate Safety Guardrails in Large Language Models
item.description: SafeRoute efficiently enhances LLM safety by adaptively using smaller and larger safety guard models, maximizing accuracy while minimizing costs.

item.title: MIVE: New Design and Benchmark for Multi-Instance Video Editing
item.description: Edit many objects at once in videos! MIVE does it accurately without affecting other areas, a big step for AI video editing.

item.title: Controllable Human Image Generation with Personalized Multi-Garments
item.description: BootComp: generate realistic human images wearing multiple garments using a novel synthetic data pipeline & diffusion model, enabling diverse applications like virtual try-on.

item.title: Efficient Long Video Tokenization via Coordinated-based Patch Reconstruction
item.description: CoordTok: a novel video tokenizer drastically reduces token count for long videos, enabling memory-efficient training of diffusion models for high-quality, long video generation.
